items.title: Lost Flash Games
items.description: A vault of browser-based games that once ruled school computer labs—now lost to the end of Flash. Click, dodge, and relive the chaos.

items.title: Classic VHS
items.description: Grainy tapes. Tracking lines. Banned TV airings. Explore forgotten films that lived in chunky plastic boxes and late-night shelves.

items.title: Forgotten Comics
items.description: Indie comic that disappeared after one issue, but managed to gather a niche but loyal following during it's time.

items.title: Arcade Exclusive
items.description: Indie runs, pulpy plots, and one-issue wonders—comics that vanished before they found an audience. Their panels live on here.

items.title: Deleted Movies
items.description: Films that were pulled, re-cut, or never released at all. Rumors, rough cuts, and stories Hollywood tried to erase.

items.title: Game Magazines
items.description: From cheat codes to cover art—vintage gaming magazines that documented an era before patch notes and DLC.
